select T.EMPID,T.USERID,T.ORGID, T.EMPNAME ,T.GENDER,T.EMPCODE,T.ORGNAME,T.EMPSTATUS,T.MOBILENO from ( select y.empid, y.empname,o.userid,g.orgid,g.orgname,y.gender,y.empcode,y.empstatus,b.mobileno,r.rolename,p.posiname from OM_EMPORG A, OM_ORGANIZATION G, OM_EMPLOYEE Y, AC_OPERATOR O, AC_OPERATORROLE E, AC_ROLE R, ABF_T_YGFJXXB B, OM_EMPPOSITION N, OM_POSITION P where y.empid = a.empid and g.orgid = a.orgid and y.empid = o.empid and O.OPERATORID = E.OPERATORID AND E.ROLEID = R.ROLEID AND Y.EMPID = B.EMPID AND N.EMPID = Y.EMPID AND N.POSITIONID = P.POSITIONID
G.ORGNAME LIKE '%'||#orgName:VARCHAR#||'%'
Y.EMPNAME = #empName:VARCHAR#
Y.EMPCODE =#empCode:VARCHAR#
R.ROLENAME LIKE '%'||#roleName:VARCHAR#||'%'
P.POSINAME LIKE '%'||#posiName:VARCHAR#||'%'
) T where 1=1 group by T.EMPID,T.USERID,T.ORGID, T.EMPNAME ,T.GENDER,T.EMPCODE,T.ORGNAME,T.EMPSTATUS,T.MOBILENO
